contents.heading: BINGO | BINGO Dog Song
contents.description:
🐾🎶 Join us for a tail-wagging good time with our rendition of the \"BINGO Dog Song\"! Watch as the playful animated dog, BINGO, leads your little ones on a musical adventure filled with fun and laughter. This classic nursery rhyme is designed to captivate children of all ages, making it the perfect addition to your nursery rhymes playlist. Sing along with the delightful lyrics, and let BINGO\'s playful antics bring joy to your child\'s day.

🌟 At Prastuti TV, we are committed to providing wholesome, educational, and entertaining content for kids. Subscribe now for more 3D Nursery Rhymes, Kids Songs, and educational videos that make learning a joyful experience for your little explorers.

👍 Don\'t forget to hit the like button, share the video with other parents, and leave a comment below to let us know which nursery rhyme you\'d like to see next!

🌟 Thank you for joining us on this musical journey with the \"BINGO Dog Song\" – where learning and laughter go paw in paw! 🐾🎉

🎵 BINGO DOG SONG LYRICS 👇

There was a farmer who had a dog,
And Bingo was his name-o.
B-I-N-G-O,
B-I-N-G-O,
B-I-N-G-O,
And Bingo was his name-o.

There was a farmer who had a dog,
And Bingo was his name-o.
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
And Bingo was his name-o.

There was a farmer who had a dog,
And Bingo was his name-o.
B-I-N-G-O,
B-I-N-G-O,
B-I-N-G-O,
And Bingo was his name-o.

There was a farmer who had a dog,
And Bingo was his name-o.
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
And Bingo was his name-o.


There was a farmer who had a dog,
And Bingo was his name-o.
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
(Clap)-I-N-G-O,
And Bingo was his name-o.

contents.heading: The Wheels on the Bus Go Round and Round
contents.description:
👇 Hop aboard for a 3D musical adventure with \\\"The Wheels on the Bus Go Round and Round\\\"! ???? Join us as we bring this beloved nursery rhyme to life in vibrant 3D animation, featuring the cheerful bus, the friendly driver, and a cast of adorable passengers who will have your little ones singing and swaying to the rhythm.

???? Watch as the wheels spin, wipers swish, and horn honks in our enchanting 3D world. The catchy tune and colorful visuals create an engaging experience that not only entertains but also promotes early childhood development through rhythm and repetition.

???? Follow the lyrics on screen as you sing along, enhancing language skills and rhythmic awareness in a fun and interactive way. At [Your Channel Name], we are passionate about creating educational and entertaining content for kids, making learning an enjoyable journey.

???? Subscribe now for more 3D Nursery Rhymes, Kids Songs, and educational videos designed to captivate young minds. Hit the like button, share this video with fellow parents, and drop a comment below to let us know which nursery rhyme you\\\'d like to see transformed into enchanting 3D animation next!

???? Thank you for joining us on the magical ride as \\\"The Wheels on the Bus Go Round and Round\\\" – where learning and laughter come together in perfect harmony! ????

The wheels on the bus go round and round lyrics:

The wheels on the bus go round and round
Round and round
Round and round
The wheels on the bus go round and round
All through the town

The wipers on the bus go swish, swish, swish
Swish, swish, swish
Swish, swish, swish
The wipers on the bus go swish, swish, swish
All through the town

The horn on the bus goes beep, beep, beep
Beep, beep, beep
Beep, beep, beep
The horn on the bus goes beep, beep, beep
All through the town

The doors on the bus go open and shut
Open and shut
Open and shut
The doors on the bus go open and shut
All through the town

The Driver on the bus says move on back
move on back 
move on back
The Driver on the bus says move on back
All through the town

The babies on the bus say “Wah, wah, wah!”
“Wah, wah, wah!”
“Wah, wah, wah!” 
The babies on the bus says  “Wah, wah, wah!”
All through the town

The mommies on the bus says “Shh, shh, shh!”
“Shh, shh, shh!”
“Shh, shh, shh!”
The mommies on the bus says “Shh, shh, shh!”
All through the town
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
???? Hop on board for a delightful 3D animated journey with the classic kids\\\' rhyme \\\"The Wheels on the Bus Go Round and Round\\\"! ???? Our enchanting animation brings this beloved nursery rhyme to life, featuring vibrant characters and playful scenes. Join the sing-along fun as the wheels go round, wipers go swish, and horns go beep! Perfect for toddlers and preschoolers, this engaging animation promises a joyous ride of laughter and learning.

????️ Subscribe for more animated nursery rhymes and educational content for young minds. Hit the bell icon to stay tuned for upcoming 3D adventures.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

contents.heading: �चंदा मामा दूर के | Chanda Mama Dur Ke
contents.description:
???? चंदा मामा आ रहे हैं आपके बच्चों के साथ एक नए और मनमोहक सफर के साथ! ???? आओ, मिलकर गाएं \\\"चंदा मामा दूर के\\\" - एक हिंदी बच्चों का रोमांटिक गाना, जिसमें है चंदा मामा का प्यारा सा सफर और बच्चों की रुचि को बढ़ाने के लिए है सजीव 3D एनीमेशन!

???? इस गाने के साथ, आपके छोटे सुनील और सुनीता को ज्यादा से ज्यादा सीखने और मनोरंजन का सामर्थ्य मिलेगा। हमारा 3D एनीमेशन न केवल बच्चों को मनोहर रूप से मनोरंजित करेगा, बल्कि उनकी भाषा विकास और रैद करने की क्षमता को भी बढ़ाएगा।

???? स्क्रीन पर दिखाए गए गीत से साथ गाएं और हमारे चैनल Prastuti TV को सब्सक्राइब करें, ताकि आप हमारे और भी मनोहर 3D नर्सरी राइम्स, हिंदी किड्स सॉन्ग्स, और शिक्षात्मक वीडियो का आनंद ले सकें।

???? लाइक बटन दबाएं, इस वीडियो को दूसरे माता-पिता के साथ साझा करें और नीचे एक कमेंट करें ताकि हमें बता सकें कि आप किस नर्सरी राइम को आगे देखना चाहेंगे! धन्यवाद कि आपने हमारे साथ \\\"चंदा मामा दूर के\\\" के साथ जुड़ा - जहाँ शिक्षा और हंसी मिलती है! ????

Chanda Mama Door Ke, Pue Pakaye Bur Ke lyrics:

Chanda Mama Door Ke, Pue Pakaye Bur Ke
Chanda Mama Door Ke, Pue Pakaye Bur Ke

Aap Khaaye Thaali Mein, Munne Ko De Pyaali Mein
Aap Khaaye Thaali Mein, Munne Ko De Pyaali Mein

Chanda Mama Door Ke, Pue Pakaye Bur Ke
Chanda Mama Door Ke, Pue Pakaye Bur Ke

Pyaali Gayi Toot, Munna Gaya Rooth
Pyaali Gayi Toot, Munna Gaya Rooth

Laayenge Nayi Pyaaliyan, Baja Bajake Taaliyan
Laayenge Nayi Pyaaliyan, Baja Bajake Taaliyan

Chanda Mama Door Ke, Pue Pakaye Bur Ke
Chanda Mama Door Ke, Pue Pakaye Bur Ke
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
चंदामामा दूर के, पुए पकाएं बूर के
चंदामामा दूर के, पुए पकाएं बूर के
आप खाएं थाली में, मुन्ने को दें प्याली में
आप खाएं थाली में, मुन्ने को दें प्याली में

प्याली गई टूट मुन्ना गया रूठ
प्याली गई टूट मुन्ना गया रूठ
लाएंगे नई प्यालियाँ बजा बजा के तालियाँ
लाएंगे नई प्यालियाँ बजा बजा के तालियाँ

मुन्ने को मनाएंगे हम दूध मलाई खाएंगे,
चंदामामा दूर के, पुए पकाएं बूर के
